Detailed Description

template<class Type>
class Flood::Vector< Type >

This template class defines a vector for general purpose use.

See also:
Matrix.

Definition at line 38 of file Vector.h.

template<class Type>
void Flood::Vector< Type >::load ( char *  filename  )  [inline]

This method loads the elements of a vector from a data file. The file format is as follows:

NumberOfElements Element_0 Element_1 ... Element_N-1

Parameters:
filename Filename.
See also:
save(char*).
